alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 4:17PM CDT until July 08 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... Western Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 417 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Opp, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Samson, Kinston, Coffee Springs, Earlytown, Hacoda, Pera, Spears, Alberton, Perry Store, Weeks, Sellersville, Lytle, Lucile, Rhoades, Marl, Ino, Central City, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Battens Crossroads and Goodman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
